page.title: 16POCKET MONEY
page.content:
81 children were asked if they had pocket money and if so how they used it.
75 had pocket money and 6 did not. More fathers than mothers give pocket money. The average amount is 80p. Lots of children have their pocket money once a week. More than half save some and spend some while the majority of the rest save everything. Only 5 spend it all.Those who spent their pocket money mostly bought sweets toys and games.
Children who do not receive pocket money have their needs met directly by their parents.
